comments: He was a really great teacher. If you let him know whats going on he will help you any way he can.

Mr G was the best teacher I had at WCC. His test are tricky sometimes but you have to think. Understanding and caring about what goes on in class. Go to class, not only will learn a lot but will help your grade a lot.

I agree. He knows a lot about everything. I wish he could have taught every class I took at wcc adn ru. Simply the best. I have never had anyone make me come early to class, and i dont really like health, or at least i didnt before his class.super,super teacher

Mr G is the greatest teacher/professor anyone could ever have. His passion for healthy lifestyles, laid-back approach to learning, and his unique ability to really bring a lot of value to health topics are awesome. If you need a health or pe class, as long as you show that you have interest in trying to be healthy, you have an A. Thank you MR G!!
